posts.post_content:
Great looking 1.5 in my opinion looking for $1500 paypal F/F. 

I also would take partial trade in the way of Giants off backs I need or SGC graded commons I need to complete my 520

Thanks for looking I'd love to hear from you, I have much larger pictures as well 

Shoot me an email at [url]Maxjcards@gmail.com[/url]

[IMG]https://i.imgur.com/yHPBZhH.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]https://i.imgur.com/6bJpS9H.jpg[/IMG]
